title: Dishoom’s Bhel
description: Dishoom‘s take on bhel – a light, almost-salad street food dish of puffed rice, sev, chopped onions, tomatoes, chilli and chutney – adds ruby-red pomegranate seeds for extra colour and flavour.
ingredients: 10g fresh coriander leaves, chopped, plus a little extra to finish the dish

method.Step 1: Briefly toss all the fresh mix ingredients together in a large bowl until combined and set aside.

method.Step 2: Stir the dry mix ingredients in another bowl and set aside.

method.Step 3: To make the dressing, stir all the ingredients together in a medium bowl until well combined.

method.Step 4: Add the dry mix to the fresh mix, then pour the dressing on top. Toss well to coat everything in the sticky dressing. Serve immediately, scattered with chopped coriander.
